description: As emerging markets are dynamically altering the economy, it’s important to study emerging trends on how international and domestic firms operate in emerging markets and what new opportunities are being created to circumvent institutional voids in these growth markets. Students will have the opportunity to directly interact with industry experts to complement class discussions. This module will captures the key learnings that organizations have encountered while operating in growth economies. It will focus on implications of participating in these markets including drivers of customer and stakeholder behaviour, how to navigate the competitive landscape, developing talent and other resource capabilities, how to influence growth market strategy, and implementation of that strategy.
title: Current Trends in Growth Markets
